dsOverview.title: Northeast Brazil Precipitation, daily and monthly, 1904-1983

summary.p: Daily and monthly rainfall for 2300 stations in 10 states in northeastern Brazil are contained in this dataset. Although the first data is for 1904, sixty percent of the stations do not report until the 1960s. The data was obtained from Jack Geisler, University of Utah.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: U-UTAH/MET > Department of Meteorology, University of Utah

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
